title: Goedel-Escher-Bach_Hofstadter_media-collection
description:
This is a collection of various media discussed in Douglas Hofstadter&#039;s book "GÃƒÂ¶del, Escher, Bach", mostly music recordings and color images.

It contains among other items recordings of "The Art Of Fugue" and "Musical Offering" by J.S. Bach, in high-quality MP3 files.

The files are named starting with the page number where the respective work is first mentioned.

The book itself is included in Djvu and PDF format, but I suggest you buy the dead tree edition.
